page.title: 07OUR FAVOURITE FOOD
page.content:
Class 2's favourite weekday tea is fish, chips and tomato sauce. Our parents' favourite meal is roast chicken with stuffing, carrots, peas and roast potatoes. For desert, apple pie and cream. { Our favourite recipe: {*CHOCOLATE CAKE*} 4oz/100g margarine 2 eggs 6oz/150g self-raising flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 4oz/100g sugar - \ white \ brown 1 tablespoon cocoa powder 1 tablespoon syrup A little orange juice
Mix altogether until there is a good dropping texture. Cook for about 40 minutes at 350-375C, or gas Mk.5. Icing can be chocolate or orange. {Dunton Bassett Primary School 21.5.85}
